subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
Please listen i just want you to know that in this new reason we have just gone our files in the central computer here in CBN and we have find out that you are one of the Beneficiaries that has not received your fund from the central bank payment process release last year. so i will advice you to listen evey well now you have not received your fund since years in the past one of the reasons is that the offical worked with did not tell you the truth of the matter and you keep on sending them money that is bad, so now we have find out that you will need this three documents to back up your fund updated from this Jan 8th 2024 if you have the below named documents stamed from Jan 8th 2024 send them over to me here so that we will call the bank lawyer to come over here immediately and stand on your be half for the signing of your payment transfer into your account. but if you do not have the updated documents please let us know immediately for the lawyer to move today and get all the documents as your fund back up once that you done please do reconfirm your account details and your address with a copy of your international passport or ID CARD thank you as i await for your reply details and information back to me now as here are the names of the documents.
A,  Anti-Terrorist certificate
B,  Money Laundry certificate.
C,  Drug free laundry certificate.
Note; please i am waiting for your reply now .
We look forward hearing from you.
Best Regards,
Mr Mark Anderson.
Deputy Governor, Financial System Stability,
Central Bank of Nigeria.

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Mr. Mark Anderson,

Thank you for reaching out to me and bringing this matter to my attention. I appreciate your concern and willingness to assist me in receiving my funds from the central bank payment process.

I must admit, I am a bit confused about the documents you mentioned. Could you please provide more information about what these documents are for and why they are necessary? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding.

Additionally, could you clarify what you mean by "backing up" my funds? How does obtaining these documents ensure that my funds will be transferred into my account?

Lastly, I would like to know how long this process usually takes. I have had some experiences in the past where things took longer than expected, so it would be helpful to have an idea of the timeline involved.

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Attention Edward,

Thank  you for your reply back to us with out your account details for the
release of your fund ( 10.5m dollars). but like as i have said from day one
that what stopped you from having your fund released to you since is that
the people you have worked in the past did not tell you truth . so now what
we only have to confirm from you is that if you have this three documents
that will back up your fund once it is released and transfer into your
account. so let us know now if you have this documents as it is below here
updated from 8th Jan 2024 but if you do not  have them let me know so that
the bank lawyer can get them on your behalf and stamp them for the transfer
of your fund into your account . so please here are the names of the
documents below.

A,  Anti-Terrorist certificate

B,  Money Laundry certificate.

C,  Drug free laundry certificate.

Please if you have any of the documents updated up to 8th Jan send them to
me now but if you do not have any let us know i will call the to tell you
his service conditions so that he can get them immediately for the transfer
of your fund i am waiting for your answers back to my office now thank you
for your understanding.
Best Regards,
Mr. Andrew Tweedi
Deputy Governor, Financial System Stability,
Central Bank of Nigeria.

subject: Re: Attention Edward, Marl Anderson is the CBN Lawyer . Reply me back now as i am waiting
body:
Dear Mr. Andrew Tweedi,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of my fund dollars. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Could you please provide more information about the three documents you mentioned? What are they for and why are they necessary for the transfer of funds?

2. How long does it usually take to obtain these documents if I don't already have them? Are there any costs associated with acquiring them?

3. Is there a specific bank lawyer that I need to contact, or will you be assigning someone to assist me with obtaining the documents?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how we can proceed with releasing my funds.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Mr. Andrew Tweedi,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of my fund dollars. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Could you please provide more information about the three documents you mentioned? What are they for and why are they necessary for the transfer of funds?

2. How long does it usually take to obtain these documents if I don't already have them? Are there any costs associated with acquiring them?

3. Is there a specific bank lawyer that I need to contact, or will you be assigning someone to assist me with obtaining the documents?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how we can proceed with releasing my funds.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear  Edward,

I have come in conclusion with the Bank lawyer who is approved by the bank
and was giving the power to touch any sensitive document like yours. so if
you want to confirm your self from the lawyer there is no problem about
that sir. now listen the lawyer said that for him to have the three
required documents from the legal department and stamp them that all will
cost you $177 dollars only and bear in mind that once the documents are
here i will attach them and send them over to you as security to your fund
once it is transfer to your account and now he said that he is ready to
move before they will close for the day so if you are ready let me know so
that we can give you the information to send the $177 dollars only that is
all thank you as i am waiting here.


We look forward hearing from you.
Best Regards,
Mr Andrew Tweedie
Deputy Governor, Financial System Stability,
Central Bank of Nigeria.

subject: Re: Dear Edward, Yes the CBN works with one lawyer and his name is Mark Anderson
body:
Dear Mr. Andrew Tweedie,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your assistance in helping me confirm the legitimacy of the lawyer involved. It's important for me to ensure that everything is in order before proceeding.

Could you please provide me with the contact details of the bank lawyer? I would like to get in touch with them directly to verify their credentials and discuss the necessary documents further. Additionally, could you clarify what these three required documents are and why they are needed?

I also wanted to inquire about the security measures that will be taken once the funds are transferred to my account. How can I be assured that my funds will be safe and protected? Are there any additional fees or charges associated with this process that I should be aware of?

Thank you for your patience and cooperation. I look forward to receiving your response.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your assistance in helping me confirm the legitimacy of the lawyer involved. It's important for me to ensure that everything is in order before proceeding.

subject: Re: Dear Edward, Yes the CBN works with one lawyer and his name is Mark Anderson
body:
Dear Edward,

Thank you as we have all come to conclusion about the release of your fund
once the lawyer is here with your account details and the three documents.
so here is the information for you to send the documents payment to our
officer in Thailand once you sent it make sure you send the payment slip to
me here he will have the money with him in about 30 mins time as soon as
you sent it thank you.

Receivers, Miss Naruemon Phontham.

Address 55 /1, Thanon Ngam Wong Wan, Khwaeng Lat Yao, Khet Chatuchak
Zipcode;

10900 Country; Thailand;

$177  Dollars only

Please (Use Western Union Or Ria Money transfer only)

I await your urgent response.

Yours faithfully,
Best Regards,

Dr . Andrew Tweedie
